mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO test_tb ( title, type, level, img, update_date ) VALUES (#{title}, #{type}, #{level}, #{img}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE test_tb SET title=#{title}, type=#{type}, level=#{level}, img=#{img}, update_date=#{updateDate} WHERE test_id=#{testId}
mapper.select: SELECT test_id, title, type, level, img, update_date FROM test_tb WHERE test_id=#{testId}
SELECT test_id, title, type, level, img, update_date FROM test_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT test_id, title, type, level, img, update_date FROM test_tb WHERE type=#{type} ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT test_id, title, type, level, img, update_date FROM test_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay}
SELECT count(test_id) FROM test_tb WHERE type=#{type}
